casebody.data:
FANNING et al. v. LEHMAN. (Supreme Court, Appellate Division, Second Department December 5, 1907.) Appeal from Special Term, Suffolk County. Action by Joshua T. Fanning and another against Edgar Lehman. Judgment for plaintiffs, and defendant appeals. Affirmed.

Argued before JENKS, HOOKER, GAYNOR, RICH, and MILDER, JJ.

Boskowitz & Levy, for appellant. Ernest W. Tooker (Timothy M. Grilling, of counsel), for respondents. PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed, with costs, on the authority of Downs v. Lehman (decided herewith) 107 N. Y. Supp. 329.
